articles.title: China Home-Price Slump Persists as Authorities Vow Stability - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: China’s home-price slump dragged on in November, the latest chapter in a yearslong downturn that policymakers have promised intensifying efforts to address.

articles.title: China’s Retail Sales Weaken to Worst Since Covid as Growth Slows - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: China’s retail sales grew at the weakest pace since the crash caused by Covid while investment slumped further, underlining growing risks to the economy after several months of deterioration.

articles.title: How iRobot lost its way home - TechCrunch
articles.description: iRobot survived three decades of competition, but couldn't survive European regulators killing its Amazon buyout. Now it's being taken over by its own supplier in bankruptcy court.

articles.title: Looking for the Next NVDA? Top Analyst Flags 3 Quantum Computing Stocks to Buy (RGTI, IONQ, QBTS) - TipRanks
articles.description: Early Nvidia investors have been rewarded handsomely, watching the AI chip giant rise to become the world’s most valuable company. Naturally, those who missed the b...

articles.title: Tesla Model Y Drives Without Occupants. What We Know. - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: A video Sunday showed a Model Y driving without occupants in Austin.

articles.title: A mom was overjoyed when she learned a drug could save her baby's life. Then she learned it cost $2 million. - CBS News
articles.description: A mom was overjoyed when she learned a gene therapy treatment could save her child's life, until she found out no one would cover the $2 million price tag.

articles.title: Investigation underway after woman found dead inside Dollar Tree freezer, Miami Police say - CBS News
articles.description: Around 8 a.m., police officers responded to the business after an employee called saying that there was a deceased woman inside.

articles.title: Spain's commitment to renewable energy may be in doubt - BBC
articles.description: The current government is politically weakened and the opposition wants more use of fossil fuels.

articles.title: Stock futures are little changed as big week of economic data kicks off: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: The moves come after the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite fell last week, as Oracle and Broadcom led a rotation away from artificial intelligence stocks.

articles.title: Bitcoin Below $89K, Markets Turn Cautious Ahead of U.S. Data and BOJ Decision - CoinDesk
articles.description: Bitcoin traded below $89,000 in quiet Sunday trading as crypto markets consolidated ahead of U.S. inflation data and central bank events.

articles.title: Mesa shuts down credit card that rewarded cardholders for paying their mortgages - TechCrunch
articles.description: Fintech startup Mesa has shut down its Homeowners Card, which awarded points to cardholders for paying their mortgages.

articles.title: The Fed's December Rate Cut Means Social Security Retirees Could Be In for a COLA Surprise - 24/7 Wall St.
articles.description: The Federal Reserve had its last meeting of 2025 on December 10 and, as FedWatch predicted, the Central Bank delivered its third straight interest rate cut. This time, rates dropped by a quarter point, which means we go into 2026 with the benchmark rate in th…

articles.title: Hassett says Federal Reserve can reject Trump’s views if he is chair - AP News
articles.description: A leading candidate to be President Donald Trump’s choice for Federal Reserve chair says he would present the president’s views to Fed officials for their consideration but they could reject them if they chose when making decisions on interest rates. Hassett’…

articles.title: Trump’s Econ Goon Lets Slip That President Is Fed Flattering Numbers - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Kevin Hassett admitted that Trump’s glowing view of the economy is led by a list of “individual items” that the administration has already made “a bunch of progress on.”

articles.title: Long-abandoned strip mall in Arlington to get a new life - WTOP
articles.description: The Arlington County Board gave final approval at its Saturday meeting to a major redevelopment project at 2601 Columbia Pike in Arlington, Virginia.

articles.title: The best photos from San Francisco's SantaCon 2025 - SFGATE
articles.description: Santa-suited partyers once again filled downtown San Francisco Saturday, as the yearly tradition that is Santacon kicked off at noon in Union Square.

articles.title: DVDs and CDs are becoming cool again, thanks mostly to Gen Z - The Washington Post
articles.description: Consumers of all ages are looking to discs to get offline and away from algorithms, and for a younger generation, it’s seen as “vintage.”
